trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized"></xref> event raised by <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized"> </xref> 이벤트에 의해 발생 <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized> event is raised when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout system causes a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> to resize automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized>이벤트가 발생할 때는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 레이아웃 시스템는 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>를 자동으로 조정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler implementation would communicate size changes to the HWND contained within the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 처리기 구현 통신 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> 내에 포함 된 HWND에 크기를 변경 하는 방식
